visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Precipitation'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly precipitation data with a custom color scheme. Additionally, configure the chart with specific margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Precipitation'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the title is styled with a bold, 18px font in a dark color. The x-axis represents months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents precipitation in millimeters, also with styled labels and a title. The data series includes monthly precipitation data with a custom color of teal. The tooltip displays the value in a user-friendly format. Additional configurations include specific chart margins, a light background color, and a legend positioned to the right with vertical alignment and styled items.
